p.k: Blood In The Water In 1980, a teenage girl was brutally murdered in her Colorado home. But in her last moments, she managed to leave investigators a clue to her attacker
A Vicious Vixen When mum-to-be Cindy is killed in a horrifying night-time attack, police discover that not everyone was excited about her and boyfriend Mark's new arrival
Secrets Can Kill When police informant Susan Smith vanishes, her sister points the finger at her mystery boyfriend. As time goes by, it starts to look like she was right
82% Officer Down After one of their own is executed in cold blood, New Orleans homicide detectives learn their suspect may have killed before
82% Chopper When an Atlanta father of two is gunned down with an AK-47, rookie detective Scott Berhalter must sift through lies and alibis to get his killers off the street
Razor's Edge When a young man is found with a gunshot wound to the temple, the scene has all the tell-tale signs of suicide. But Lieutenant Joe Kenda thinks otherwise
Colorado Springs police detective Joseph Kenda investigates another brutal homicide
Blood In The Water In 1980, a teenage girl was brutally murdered in her Colorado home. But in her last moments, she managed to leave investigators a clue to her attacker
82% Officer Down After one of their own is executed in cold blood, New Orleans homicide detectives learn their suspect may have killed before
New. Jill Meagher The tragic story of Jill Meagher, a 29-year-old Irish woman living in Australia who was raped and murdered while walking
78% Clare Wood The father of Clare Wood discusses how her murder in Salford in 2009 gave birth to a new law allowing people to find out if their partners
Rachel O'Reilly The tragic story of mother of two Rachel O'Reilly, who was beaten to death by her husband Joe at home in north County Dublin in October 2004
Murder Bites A young woman is found naked and strangled in a park less than 200 yards from her home. Lt Joe Kenda rethinks the entire case to make a breakthrough
Gruesome Discovery Police investigate the real-life case of a woman whose body was found in a rubbish bin. Could she have been the victim of a co-worker's violent obsession?
Evil Beasts True crime documentary series following determined investigators as they piece together events during the critical 24-hour window after a crime
82% Taken For A Ride In medicine, they call it the 'critical hour', in criminal investigations; they call it The First 48
New. Colorado Springs police detective Joseph Kenda investigates another brutal homicide
New. Deadly Homecoming It looked like a typical robbery, but things were far from what they seemed when Navy officer Cory Voss was shot at a cash machine
Luxury, Jealousy And Murder There must be a murderer on the guest list when a business convention's rich organiser is bludgeoned with a barbell in his room
New. One day they are there, then they are never seen again. Countless people have disappeared in America's national parks. Who or what is responsible
